alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 28 at 2:43PM PDT until March 28 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
